name: @cira/infrastructure
description: AWS CDK infrastructure definitions for invoice processing system

scripts.build:app: npm run -w @cira/database build && rm -f ../../dist/.tsbuildinfo && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:app && cdk deploy --all --context environment=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:app && cdk deploy --all --context environment=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:app && cdk deploy --all --context environment=prod
